title: Russia Central In G7 Conversation
teaser: In Brussels, Russia dominated a press conference today even though President Putin is not at the meeting of the G7.
contentencoded:
In Brussels, Russia dominated a press conference today even though President Putin is not at the meeting of the G7, usually the G8. President Obama appeared with British Prime Minister David Cameron and took a number of questions.

NPR’s Scott Horsley is traveling with the president and discusses his impressions with Here & Now’s Robin Young.

Guest

  • Scott Horsley, NPR White House correspondent.
